Package ark.system

Class ClassLoaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ark.system.ClassLoaderHelper

  • public class ClassLoaderHelper
extends Object
    Obtains the information that is loaded by the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator, including information about native libraries and resources.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ClassLoaderHelper​()

    • Method Detail

      • findResources

        public static Enumeration<URL> findResources​(ClassLoader classLoader,
                                             String name)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Searches for resources that have been loaded by the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - Indicates the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        name - Indicates the name of the resources to search for.
        Returns:
        Returns all the URLs matching the name if any; returns null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the passed ClassLoader instance is not created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Since:
        3

      • findNativeLibrary

        public static String findNativeLibrary​(ClassLoader classLoader,
                                       String name)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Searches for a specified native library that has been loaded by the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - Indicates the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        name - Indicates the name of the native library to search for.
        Returns:
        Returns the native library path if a match is found; returns null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the passed ClassLoader instance is not created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Since:
        3

      • toString

        public static String toString​(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Obtains information about the specified ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - Indicates the ClassLoader instance created via ClassLoaderCreator.
        Returns:
        Returns information about the ClassLoader instance.
        Since:
        3
